text: The String Quartet No. 14 in C minor, Opus 131, is a string quartet by Ludwig van Beethoven. He wrote it between November 1825 and July 1826. It was published in Mainz, Germany in April 1827 (after Beethoven's death) with a dedication to Baron Joseph von Stutterheim. The work consists of seven movements played without a break: #Adagio ma non troppo e molto espressivo #Allegro molto vivace #Allegro moderato #Andante ma non troppo e molto cantabile #Presto #Adagio quasi un poco andante #Allegro It is about 40 minutes in length. == References == Category:String quartets Category:Compositions by Ludwig van Beethoven Category:Compositions in C-sharp minor
title: String Quartet No. 14 (Beethoven)
